verses.verse: It <S%H8050>happened,<s%> when Samuel was <S%H2204>old,<s%> that he <S%H7760>made<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H8199>judges<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H1121>firstborn<s%> was <S%H3100>Joel;<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H4932>second,<s%> <S%H29>Abijah:<s%> they were <S%H8199>judges<s%> in <S%H884>Beersheba.<s%>

His <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H1980>didn't<s%> walk in his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> but turned <S%H5186>aside<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1215>lucre,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H7810>bribes,<s%> and <S%H5186>perverted<s%> <S%H4941>justice.<s%>
Then all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6908>together,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> to <S%H7414>Ramah;<s%>

and they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2204>him,<s%> "Behold, you are old, and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H1980>don't<s%> walk in your <S%H1870>ways:<s%> now <S%H7760>make<s%> us a <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> us like all the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>"

But the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3415>displeased<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> when they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5414>"Give<s%> us a <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H8050>us.<s%>" Samuel <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H8085>"Listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> in all that they <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H3988>you;<s%> for they have not rejected <S%H3988>you,<s%> but they have rejected <S%H4427>me,<s%> that I should not be king over them.

According to all the <S%H4639>works<s%> which they have <S%H6213>done<s%> since the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I brought them <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> even to this <S%H3117>day,<s%> in that they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H5647>me,<s%> and served <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> so do they also to <S%H6213>you.<s%>

Now therefore <S%H8085>listen<s%> to their <S%H6963>voice:<s%> <S%H389>however<s%> you shall <S%H5749>protest<s%> <S%H5749>solemnly<s%> to <S%H5046>them,<s%> and shall show them the <S%H4941>way<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> who shall reign over <S%H4427>them.<s%>"
<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>told<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H7592>asked<s%> of him a <S%H4428>king.<s%>

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "This will be the <S%H4941>way<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> who shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> over <S%H3947>you:<s%> he will take your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H7760>appoint<s%> them to <S%H4818>him,<s%> for his chariots, and to be his <S%H6571>horsemen;<s%> and they shall <S%H7323>run<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4818>chariots;<s%>

and he will <S%H7760>appoint<s%> them to him for <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands,<s%> and <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H2572>fifties;<s%> and he will assign some to <S%H2790>plow<s%> his <S%H2758>ground,<s%> and to <S%H7114>reap<s%> his <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> and to <S%H6213>make<s%> his <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> and the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of his <S%H7393>chariots.<s%>
He will <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to be <S%H7548>perfumers,<s%> and to be <S%H2879>cooks,<s%> and to be <S%H644>bakers.<s%>

He will <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H7704>fields,<s%> and your <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and your <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H2896>groves,<s%> even their best, and <S%H5414>give<s%> them to his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
He will take the <S%H6237>tenth<s%> of your <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and of your <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> to his <S%H5631>officers,<s%> and to his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

He will <S%H3947>take<s%> your male <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and your female <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and your <S%H2896>best<s%> young <S%H970>men,<s%> and your <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%> and <S%H6213>put<s%> them to his <S%H4399>work.<s%>
He will take the <S%H6237>tenth<s%> of your <S%H6629>flocks:<s%> and you shall be his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

You shall cry <S%H2199>out<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of your <S%H4428>king<s%> whom you shall have <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H3068>you;<s%> and Yahweh will not <S%H6030>answer<s%> you in that <S%H3117>day.<s%>"
But the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8050>Samuel;<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4428>"No;<s%> but we will have a king over us,

that we also may be like all the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and that our <S%H4428>king<s%> may <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H3318>us,<s%> and go out <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3898>us,<s%> and fight our <S%H4421>battles.<s%>"
<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and he <S%H1696>rehearsed<s%> them in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H8085>"Listen<s%> to their <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H4427>make<s%> them a <S%H4428>king.<s%>" <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "Every <S%H582>man<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> to his <S%H5892>city.<s%>"
